description: Helpers for calling other n8n workflows. Used for designing modular, microservice-like workflows.

properties.name: events
properties.description: When called by another workflow using Execute Workflow Trigger

properties.name: notice
properties.displayName: When an ‘execute workflow’ node calls this workflow, the execution starts here. Any data passed into the 'execute workflow' node will be output by this node.

properties.name: outdatedVersionWarning
properties.displayName: This node is out of date. Please upgrade by removing it and adding a new one

properties.name: Define using JSON example
properties.description: Generate a schema from an example JSON object

properties.name: Accept all data
properties.description: Use all incoming data from the parent workflow
